params._counterpart: The address of `L2USDCGateway` contract in L2.
params._router: The address of `L1GatewayRouter` contract in L1.

depositERC20(address,address,uint256,uin.details: Make this function payable to send relayer fee in Ether.

params._amount: The amount of token to transfer.
params._gasLimit: Gas limit required to complete the deposit on L2.
params._to: The address of recipient's account on L2.
params._token: The address of token in L1.

depositERC20(address,uint256,uint256).details: Make this function payable to send relayer fee in Ether.

params._amount: The amount of token to transfer.
params._gasLimit: Gas limit required to complete the deposit on L2.
params._token: The address of token in L1.

depositERC20AndCall(address,address,uint.details: Make this function payable to send relayer fee in Ether.

params._amount: The amount of token to transfer.
params._data: Optional data to forward to recipient's account.
params._gasLimit: Gas limit required to complete the deposit on L2.
params._to: The address of recipient's account on L2.
params._token: The address of token in L1.

finalizeWithdrawERC20(address,address,ad.details: Make this function payable to handle WETH deposit/withdraw.      The function should only be called by L1ScrollMessenger.      The function should also only be called by L2ERC20Gateway in L2.

params._amount: The amount of the token to withdraw.
params._data: Optional data to forward to recipient's account.
params._from: The address of account who withdraw the token in L2.
params._l1Token: The address of corresponding L1 token.
params._l2Token: The address of corresponding L2 token.
params._to: The address of recipient in L1 to receive the token.

initialize(address,address,address).details: The parameters `_counterpart`, `_router` and `_messenger` are no longer used.

params._counterpart: The address of L2CustomERC20Gateway in L2.
params._messenger: The address of L1ScrollMessenger in L1.
params._router: The address of L1GatewayRouter in L1.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._l1Token: The address of ERC20 token on layer 1.
params._l2Token: The address of corresponding ERC20 token on layer 2.

counterpart().notice: The address of corresponding L1/L2 Gateway contract.

depositERC20(address,address,uint256,uin.notice: Deposit some token to a recipient's account on L2.

depositERC20(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Deposit some token to a caller's account on L2.

depositERC20AndCall(address,address,uint.notice: Deposit some token to a recipient's account on L2 and call.

finalizeWithdrawERC20(address,address,ad.notice: Complete ERC20 withdraw from L2 to L1 and send fund to recipient's account in L1.

getL2ERC20Address(address).notice: Return the corresponding l2 token address given l1 token address.

messenger().notice: The address of corresponding L1ScrollMessenger/L2ScrollMessenger contract.

tokenMapping(address).notice: Mapping from l1 token address to l2 token address for ERC20 token.

updateTokenMapping(address,address).notice: Update layer 1 to layer 2 token mapping.

documentation.text: @notice Mapping from l1 token address to l2 token address for ERC20 token.
